question: Match Column-I with Column-II related to an electric dipole of dipole moment p that is placed in a uniform electric field E.
Column - I (Angle between p and E)
a) 180°
b) 120°
c) 90°
Column - II (Potential energy)
i) -pE
ii) pE
iii) pE/2
iv) Zero
explanation: a) θ = 180°: U = -pE cos(180) = -pE(-1) = pE -> Matches (ii).
b) θ = 120°: U = -pE cos(120) = -pE(-1/2) = pE/2 -> Matches (iii).
